metadata.synopsis: A birthday dwarf is brought by his friend to Sharess Caress. The idea of celebrating his majority in a bordelo has left said dwarf quite sour, for more than one reason. This is the friend 01's one-liner.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to 6; 50; 84- talk to the first human friend

0.speaker: Embry
0.text: Oh, we're not queuing for Sharess' Carress - not yet anyway. Head on in!

1.speaker: Embry
1.text: Don't mind us, mate - have fun inside. Plenty fun, you hear?
1.context: NodeContext: a wink wink nudge nudge type of comment
